c74object.name: rtt.resync~

method.name: signal
method.description: A signal to the first inlet should have a value between 0. and 1. will typically be a ramp.

attribute.name: phase
attribute.digest: Sets the phase to jump to when an impulse is received at the second inlet.

c74object.description: rtt.resync~ can be used to cause a phasor-based clock signal to “jump” from its current value to another value between 0. and 1. This capability can be used to play back segments of patterns and sequences or to create custom playback directions.
c74object.digest: Reset the phase of a ramp signal.
